short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Clipper to easily clip all the content you want from the internet to Samantha Notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clear the clutter. Clip the web. Save to Samantha Notes.
Samantha.ai Web Clipper
Easily capture meaningful content from the web and save it to Samantha Notes with the Web Clipper. Highlight text directly from any webpage and store it instantly in your notes for later use. Samantha makes staying reflective, organized, and mindful a seamless part of your online experience.

What can you clip?
Highlight and Save:
Planning a Trip? Highlight travel tips or a packing list from a blog and save it directly to your travel notes.
Learning Something New? Highlight key points from an online course or article, and save them for later review.
Saving Ideas for Work? Capture helpful tips from a professional article like "Best Practices for Leading Remote Teams" to reference during team meetings.
Clean Article View: Found an article you'd like to revisit, like "10 Tips for Better Self-Care"? Save it without distractions like ads or pop-ups to keep your notes clean and focused
Organize with Tags and Reminders: Add tags like "Wellness," "Work," or "Personal Development" to your saved content to easily find it when needed. Set reminders to revisit your notes for reflection or action.

How to Get Started
Download the Samantha.ai Web Clipper today and transform your browser into a tool for self-reflection and productivity. With Samantha, mental wellness and organization are always just a click away!


Changelog: Samantha.ai Web Clipper
v1.0.0: Clip and Save Highlights
Introduced the ability to highlight text on any webpage and save it directly to Samantha Notes. Perfect for capturing insights, quotes, or key points without leaving your browser.
All highlights are instantly synced across devices, ensuring your notes are accessible wherever you need them.
 Add tags and categorize your saved highlights for easy searching and organization.
v1.0.1: Save Entire Articles
Added the option to save entire articles to your notes, removing distractions like ads and pop-ups for a clean, focused reading experience.
Save long-form content effortlessly with a single click, directly into Samantha Notes.
Saved articles are automatically tagged for quick categorization and retrieval.
Fixed an issue where Samantha will mess up the layouts of the pages you visit (eg. Gmail)
